cmd='/usr/bin/cmake;-G;Unix Makefiles;-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELWITHDEBINFO;-DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/usr/bin/cc;-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=;-DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/usr/bin/c++;-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=;-DCMAKE_CXX_STANDARD=17;-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/heinemann/gpuunpacker/cbmroot/build2;-DVc_INCLUDE_DIR=/home/cbmdata/_deps/fairsoft_apr22/install/include;-DVc_LIBRARIES=;-DFIXTARGET=TRUE;-DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=/home/cbmdata/_deps/fairsoft_apr22/install/;-DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE:BOOL=ON;-GUnix Makefiles;<SOURCE_DIR><SOURCE_SUBDIR>'
